OA JV Baseball recently played South Decatur at Liberty Park. Here are the final results: SD 002 00 2 2 1 OA 002 46 12 6 0 For OA: Jordan Stenger 0-0 2 runs, 4 bb, 2 rbi, sb Hunter Sullivan 2-2, run, 3 rbi Abe Peetz 0-3, run, 3 rbi Zach Wegman

Congratulations to the Lady Twisters Tennis Team for winning their third consecutive sectional championship, taking down Batesville on Saturday. They won with a score of 4-1 in the title match. It is their fifth title in the last seven years. Good job!

Every high school student-athlete faces challenges–in the classroom, in their sport, and even at home. It seems like there is always an obstacle to overcome. Research is clear that it really does pay to be positive during difficult times. The benefits include enhanced health and longevity, happiness, career advancement, and athletic performance. Writer Jon Gordon

This Spring, we’ve seen several state and school records fall across the network. Who was the best in Indiana? Nominate your favorite with the form below. Nominations close on May 22 at 12pm EST, and voting begins on Tuesday, May 23. Loading… Presented by:

Oldenburg Academy will be hosting a youth soccer camp this summer at Gillespie Park from July 10-13. This is an event for boys and girls alike. Further information can be found in the attached flyer.SOCCER YOUTH CAMP 2017

As a big sports fan, there’s nothing more gratifying than watching an athlete that plays with enthusiasm and high energy.
